Articles.Content: Just going to make this really short. I think a throttle lock key would be great. Something that prevents shift, ctrl, z, or x from doing anything with the throttle so that you don't accidently mess something up because I tend to do that a lot.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
